title: Character Creation
content: entity is the core of the game and your interactions in the game revolve around who you have created, which is why it was important to pay such attention to details to the character-creating process at the start of the game. The creation of your character is part of the experience and your choices during this stage will further impact your experiences and choices as you play. It is important that players had a lot of room for expression during this stage to match the desired appearances with eac
